summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the agenda for a meeting scheduled on October 22, 2013. It involves several individuals from Deutsche Bank discussing the preparation of materials for the meeting, indicating a professional context related to client management and investment coverage.

persons.name: Caroline Kitidis
persons.context: Caroline Kitidis is the sender of the email, requesting a professional version of the meeting agenda to be prepared.

persons.name: Tazia Smith
persons.context: Tazia Smith is involved in the email correspondence, providing revisions for the meeting agenda.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is cc'd in the email correspondence, indicating her involvement in the meeting preparations.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is a recipient of the email and is mentioned in the context of discussing revisions to the meeting agenda.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is cc'd in the email, suggesting involvement in the meeting agenda preparations.

persons.name: Monica Wilkinson
persons.context: Monica Wilkinson is mentioned in the email as someone who should prepare the agenda on letterhead.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 26th Floor, New York, NY 10154-0004
keyFacts: The email correspondence is dated October 21, 2013.
The subject of the email is regarding the agenda for a meeting scheduled for October 22, 2013.
Caroline Kitidis requests a professional version of the meeting agenda to be prepared by 10 AM.
The document is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
